did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Memorabilia, broadsides, photographs, and other ephemeral material from the official and alternative Stonewall 25 marches and associated cultural festival, June 25-26, 1994. Also, the video "Stonewall 25: the future is ours!," a Lefthand production for Stonewall, Inc.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Memorabilia, broadsides, photographs, and other ephemeral material from the official and alternative Stonewall 25 marches and associated cultural festival, June 25-26, 1994. Also, the video "Stonewall 25: the future is ours!," a Lefthand production for Stonewall, Inc.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Stonewall 25 celebrations memorabilia, #7587. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Memorabilia, broadsides, photographs, and other ephemeral material
